mapper.sql: id, depart_id,depart_code,depart_name,user_id,username, source_file, err_file, success_count, fail_count, import_date, import_type,end_date,remark
mapper.insert: insert into tb_import_history (id, depart_id,depart_code,depart_name, user_id, username,source_file, err_file, success_count, fail_count, import_date, import_type,end_date,remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{departId},#{departCode},#{departName},#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{username}, #{sourceFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{failCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{importDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{importType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{endDate},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
depart_id,
depart_code,
depart_name,
user_id,

mapper.update:
update tb_import_history
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
depart_id = #{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
depart_code = #{departCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
depart_name = #{departName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_file = #{sourceFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
err_file = #{errFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
success_count = #{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fail_count = #{failCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
import_date = #{importDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
import_type = #{importType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_import_history set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, depart_id = #{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, depart_code = #{departCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, depart_name = #{departName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_file = #{sourceFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, err_file = #{errFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success_count = #{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fail_count = #{failCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, import_date = #{importDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, import_type = #{importType,jdbcType=INTEGER} end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select COUNT(1) from tb_import_history where depart_code like CONCAT(#{obj.departCode},'%') and import_type=#{obj.importType}
and depart_name like CONCAT('%',#{obj.departName},'%')
